name: Supply_Chain_Compromise
postprocess: Verify app store/enterprise certificate authenticity, check developer signatures, analyze build timestamps, correlate with known compromised packages/SDKs.
examples: Malicious CocoaPods dependency found in legitimate app
Enterprise distribution certificate abuse for unauthorized app distribution
Compromised third-party SDK with backdoor functionality
remediation: Remove compromised apps, verify developer certificates, check app sources, update development tools, audit build processes, implement code signing verification.
description: Detects supply chain compromises affecting iOS development tools, libraries, and distribution channels.
